mapper.select: select count(*) from member where status = 'Y' and sort = 2
select id , name , phone , subject_name as "subject" from member m left join subject s on(m.subject = s.subject_no) where m.status = 'Y' and sort = 2 order by subject
mapper.update: update member set status='N' where id = #{id} and sort = 2
mapper.select: select id , name , phone , image , to_char(employee_date, ('YYYY-MM-DD')) as "employee_date" , email , subject_name as "subject" , address || detail_address as "ADDRESS" from member m join subject on (subject = subject_no) where m.status='Y' and sort = 2 and id = #{ id }
select count(*) from member where status = 'Y' and sort = 3

select id , name , s.subject_name as "subject" , round((a.count / (m.end_date - m.start_date)) * 100, 1) as "attendance_rate" , m.status as "status" , s.class_no from member m join attendance a using(id) join subject s on (m.subject = s.subject_no) where sort = 3 and (m.status = 'Y' or m.status = 'A') order by m.status
